Title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
Writer: Ol Parker, Richard Curtis (story by), Ol Parker (story by), Catherine Johnson (story by), Catherine Johnson (based on the original musical by), Judy Craymer (originally conceived by), ABBA (based on the songs of)
Actors: Amanda Seyfried, Andy Garcia, Celia Imrie, Lily James
Plot: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.
